p: Additionally, the levels of proinflammatory cytokines MPO, IL-6, and TNF- α were significantly increased in the BLM-treated group compared to the control group. MPO increase was ameliorated by PRO at doses of 50 and 100 mg/kg, showing 36.49% and 64.64% decline comparable to the BLM-treated group in the previously mentioned doses, respectively. Moreover, the elevation of IL-6 and TNF- α levels were significantly lowered by PRO in a dose-dependent level, showing 58.85% and 77.78% decline relative to the negative control group at 100 mg/kg body weight, as shown in Table 2.
